title: Could you help me to recognize a type of 1969?
content:
Hi!  
I need to know about the name of this type.  
It’s a type of a magazine of 1969.  
Do you know it?

Thank you

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821153132im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/letra_4804.jpg)

 [‹ Circa 1920s Handwriting](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821153132/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44328 "Go to previous forum topic") [SOS! Boat Name font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821153132/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44361 "Go to next forum topic")
author: plya_aylp

comments.content: Don’t you have it a bit bigger?

Yes, of course  
And I include two more type  
Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821153132im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/jn4_5610.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821153132im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/jn_5665.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821153132im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/jn3_4577.jpg)
The top is very close to the Times New Roman that comes with Windows. I haven’t really seen other versions of Times, but I think it’s Times.

Middle is Avant Garde.  
Bottom is Futura.
